actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Organ Transplant Amendments Act of 1988 to change an effective date.

summary.text: Amends the Organ Transplant Amendments Act of 1988 to make certain amendments to the description of a qualified organ procurement organization effective on January 1, 1991. (Current law excludes from the application of those amendments an organ procurement organization designated under specified provisions of the Social Security Act until two years after the initial designation of the organization under such provisions.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Organ Transplant Amendments Act of 1988 to change an effective date.
